00197             function                process_textarea( $Str , $Changed )
00198             {
00199                   try
00200                   {
00201                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'textarea' ) ; )
00202                         {
00203                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00204                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'toolbar' , 'ultimix_full' );
00205                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'name' , 'editor');
00206                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'class' , 'width_640 height_480' );
00207                               $Text = $this->String->get_block_data( $Str , "textarea:$Parameters" , '~textarea' );
00208                               $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'text' , $Text );
00209                               
00210                               $EditorTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'editor.tpl' );
00211                               $RawSettings = $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings();
00212                               $EditorTemplate = $this->String->print_record( $EditorTemplate , $RawSettings );
00213                               $Str = str_replace( "{textarea:$Parameters}" , $EditorTemplate."{textarea:$Parameters}" , $Str );
00214                               
00215                               $Str = $this->String->hide_block( $Str , "textarea:$Parameters" , '~textarea' , $Changed );
00216                               $Changed = true;
00217                         }
00218                         
00219                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00220                   }
00221                   catch( Exception $e )
00222                   {
00223                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00224                   }
00225             }

00253             function                process_collapsing_widget( $Str , $Changed )
00254             {
00255                   try
00256                   {
00257                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'collapsing_widget' ) ; )
00258                         {
00259                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00260                               $Width = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'width' , '400px' );
00261                               $BorderColor = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'border_color' , 'black' );
00262                               $BackgroundColor = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'border_color' , 'white' );
00263                               $ButtonText = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'button_text' , 'white' );
00264                               $Timeout = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'timeout' , 200 );
00265                               $DivSelector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'div_selector' , 200 );
00266                               $Str = str_replace( 
00267                                     "{collapsing_widget:$Parameters}" , 
00268                                     "<script>$( '$DivSelector' ).collapsing_widget( ".
00269                                           "{ 'width' : '$Width' , 'button_text' : '$ButtonText' , 'timeout' : $Timeout , ".
00270                                           "'border_color' : '$BorderColor' , 'background_color' : '$BackgroundColor' , '' ".
00271                                           "} );</script>" , 
00272                                     $Str
00273                               );
00274                               $Changed = true;
00275                         }
00276                         
00277                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00278                   }
00279                   catch( Exception $e )
00280                   {
00281                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00282                   }

00311             function                process_href( $Str , $Changed )
00312             {
00313                   try
00314                   {
00315                         $Rules = array( 'tpl' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'page' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'action' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00316                         
00317                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'href' , $Rules ) ; )
00318                         {
00319                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00320                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'waiting' , 'false' );
00321                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'text' , 'no_text' );
00322                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'raw_text' , '' );
00323 
00324                               $FileName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'tpl' , 'std' );
00325                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $FileName.'.tpl' );
00326 
00327                               $ConfirmString = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'confirm_string' , 'are_you_shure' );
00328                               $Template = str_replace( '{confirm_string}' , $ConfirmString , $Template );
00329 
00330                               $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings() );
00331                               $Str = str_replace( "{href:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
00332                               $Changed = true;
00333                         }
00334                         
00335                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00336                   }
00337                   catch( Exception $e )
00338                   {
00339                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00340                   }
00341             }

00365             function                get_select_data( &$BlockSettings )
00366             {
00367                   try
00368                   {
00369                         if( $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'query' , false ) !== false )
00370                         {
00371                               $Query = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'query' );
00372                               $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00373                               $Records = $this->Database->query( $Query );
00374                               $Records = $this->Database->fetch_results( $Records );
00375                               $First = get_field_ex( $Records , 'id' );
00376                               $Second = get_field_ex( $Records , 'value' );
00377                         }
00378                         else
00379                         {
00380                               $First = explode( '|' , $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'first' , false ) );
00381                               $Second = explode( '|' , $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'second' , false ) );
00382                         }
00383                         
00384                         return( array( $First , $Second ) );
00385                   }
00386                   catch( Exception $e )
00387                   {
00388                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00389                   }
00390             }

00418             function                process_select( $Str , $Changed )
00419             {
00420                   try
00421                   {
00422                         $Rules = array( 'name' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'default' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00423                         
00424                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'select' , $Rules ) ; )
00425                         {
00426                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00427                               $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
00428                               $Class = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'class' , 'width_320 flat' );
00429 
00430                               $SelectedId = $this->Security->get_gp( 
00431                                     $Name , 'string' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'default' , false )
00432                               );
00433 
00434                               list( $First , $Second ) = $this->get_select_data( $this->BlockSettings );
00435                               
00436                               $Template = "<select id=\"$Name\" name=\"$Name\" class=\"$Class\">";
00437 
00438                               foreach( $First as $k => $v )
00439                               {
00440                                     $Selected = '';
00441                                     
00442                                     if( $SelectedId !== false && $SelectedId == $v )
00443                                     {
00444                                           $Selected = 'selected ';
00445                                     }
00446                                     
00447                                     $Template .= '<option '.$Selected.'value="'.$v.'">'.$Second[ $k ];
00448                               }
00449                               
00450                               $Template .= '</select>';
00451                               
00452                               $Str = str_replace( "{select:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
00453 
00454                               $Changed = true;
00455                         }
00456                         
00457                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00458                   }
00459                   catch( Exception $e )
00460                   {
00461                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00462                   }
00463             }

00599             function                process_get_var( $Str , $Changed )
00600             {
00601                   try
00602                   {
00603                         $Rules = array( 'name' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00604                         
00605                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'get_var' , $Rules ) ; )

00610                               $Value = isset( $this->Vars[ $Name ] ) ? 
00611                                     $this->Vars[ $Name ] : 
00612                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'default' , '' );
00613

00653             function                process_date_picker( $Str , $Changed )
00654             {
00655                   try
00656                   {
00657                         $Rules = array( 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00658                         
00659                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'date_picker' , $Rules ) ; )
00660                         {
00661                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00662                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'date_picker.tpl' );
00663                               
00664                               $Template = str_replace( '{name}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' ) , $Template );
00665                               $Value = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' , '' );
00666                               $Template = str_replace( '{value}' , $Value , $Template );
00667

00669 
00670                               $Changed = true;
00671                         }

00707             function                process_year_list( $Str , $Changed )
00708             {
00709                   try
00710                   {
00711                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'year_list' ) ; )
00712                         {
00713                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00714                               $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
00715                               $Class = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'class' , 'flat width_80' );
00716                               $Template = '<select id="'.$Name.'" name="'.$Name.'" class="'.$Class.'">';
00717                               
00718                               $Default = date( 'Y' , strtotime( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'default' , 'now' ) ) );
00719                               $Default = $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'string' , $Default );
00720                               
00721                               $From = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'from' , intval( date( 'Y' ) ) - 10 );
00722                               $To = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'to' , intval( date( 'Y' ) ) + 10 );
00723                               
00724                               for( $i = $From ; $i <= $To ; $i++ )
00725                               {
00726                                     if( $Default == $i )
00727                                     {
00728                                           $Template .= '<option value="'.$i.'" selected>'.$i.'</option>';
00729                                     }
00730                                     else
00731                                     {
00732                                           $Template .= '<option value="'.$i.'">'.$i.'</option>';
00733                                     }
00734                               }
00735 
00736                               $Template .= '</select>';
00737                               
00738                               $Str = str_replace( "{year_list:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
00739 
00740                               $Changed = true;
00741                         }
00742                         
00743                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00744                   }
00745                   catch( Exception $e )
00746                   {
00747                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00748                   }
00749             }

00777             function                process_date( $Str , $Changed )
00778             {
00779                   try
00780                   {
00781                         $Rules = array( 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'timestamp' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00782                         
00783                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'date' , $Rules ) ; )
00784                         {
00785                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00786                               $Format = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'format' , 'Y-m-d' );
00787                               
00788                               if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' , false ) !== false )
00789                               {
00790                                     $Value = date( $Format , strtotime( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' , 'now' ) ) );
00791                               }
00792                               else
00793                               {
00794                                     $Value = date( $Format , intval( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'timestamp' , time() ) ) );
00795                               }
00796                               
00797                               $Str = str_replace( "{date:$Parameters}" , $Value , $Str );
00798                               $Changed = true;
00799                         }
00800                         
00801                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00802                   }
00803                   catch( Exception $e )
00804                   {
00805                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00806                   }
00807             }

00835             function                process_composer( $Str , $Changed )
00836             {
00837                   try
00838                   {
00839                         $Rules = array( 'condition' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00840                         
00841                         for( ; $this->PageParser->find_next_macro( $Str , 'composer' , $Rules ) ; )
00842                         {
00843                               $BlockSettings = &$this->PageParser->get_macro_parameters();
00844                               $Condition = intval( $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'condition' ) );
00845 
00846                               if( $Condition )
00847                               {
00848                                     $Str = $this->PageParser->show_macro( $Str , 'composer' );
00849                               }
00850                               else
00851                               {
00852                                     $Str = $this->PageParser->hide_macro( $Str , 'composer' );
00853                               }
00854                               $Changed = true;
00855                         }
00856                         
00857                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00858                   }
00859                   catch( Exception $e )
00860                   {
00861                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00862                   }
00863             }

00895             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00896             {
00897                   try
00898                   {
00899                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_href( $Str , $Changed );
00900                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_textarea( $Str , $Changed );
00901                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_select( $Str , $Changed );
00902                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_timer( $Str , $Changed );
00903                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_set_var( $Str , $Changed );
00904                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_get_var( $Str , $Changed );
00905                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_date_picker( $Str , $Changed );
00906                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_year_list( $Str , $Changed );
00907                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_date( $Str , $Changed );
00908                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_composer( $Str , $Changed );
00909                         $Str = $this->ButtonMarkup->process_string( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00910                         $Str = $this->CheckboxMarkup->process_string( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00911                         $Str = $this->FSMarkup->process_string( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00912                         $Str = $this->KeyboardMarkup->process_string( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00913                         $Str = $this->MathMarkup->process_string( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00914                         $Str = $this->MouseMarkup->process_string( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00915                         $Str = $this->RadiobuttonMarkup->process_string( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00916                         $Str = $this->StringMarkup->process_string( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00917                         $Str = $this->VideoMarkup->process_string( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00918                         $Str = str_replace( '{locked}' , 'onkeypress="return( false );"' , $Str );
00919                         return( $Str );
00920                   }
00921                   catch( Exception $e )
00922                   {
00923                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00924                   }
00925             }

00961             function                process_common_widgets( $FilePath , $Entity , $Str , &$Changed )
00962             {
00963                   try
00964                   {
00965                         $Str = str_replace( '{'.$Entity.'_input}' , '{'.$Entity.'_input:f=1}' , $Str );
00966                         
00967                         $Str = $this->MultipleInput->input( $FilePath , $Entity , $Str , $Changed );
00968                         
00969                         $Str = str_replace( '{'.$Entity.'_input_field}' , '{'.$Entity.'_input_field:f=1}' , $Str );
00970 
00971                         $Str = $this->MultipleInput->input_field( $FilePath , $Entity , $Str , $Changed );
00972                         
00973                         $Str = $this->JsDialogs->selection_dialog( $FilePath , $Entity , $Str , $Changed );
00974                         
00975                         $Str = str_replace( '{multiple_'.$Entity.'_input}' , '{multiple_'.$Entity.'_input:f=1}' , $Str );
00976                         
00977                         $Str = $this->MultipleInput->multiple_input( $FilePath , $Entity , $Str , $Changed );
00978                         
00979                         return( $Str );
00980                   }
00981                   catch( Exception $e )
00982                   {
00983                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00984                   }
00985             }
